page.title: 26East Wittering Community Primary School
page.content:
East Wittering Primary School is a sixteen roomed school including; eight fabulous classrooms, a child friendly kitchen, an incredible library, an SEN room and an ICT suite.

Mrs Parker, our Head Teacher, is in charge of eight teachers and a fantastic team of LSAs. There is a bursar and three members of office staff. All the adults who work at East Wittering school are extremely kind and helpful. We take part in a huge range of lessons and activities and recently our school has introduced Big Maths and Big Writing.

We have eleven supportive governors and 'The Friends' who are a group of parents who organise fundraising events such as the Christams and Summer Fair.
Contribution by: The children of East Wittering School
